Verses: 1 pelisdhar Thangal Senaikalaiyellaam Aappekkile Kootivarachcheydhaarkal; Isravelar Yesrayelilirukkira Thuravantaiyile Paalayamiranginaarkal.
2 appozhudhu Pelisdharin Adhipadhikal Noorum Aayiramumaana Servaikalote Ponaarkal; Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Aakeesote Pindhantile Ponaarkal.

3 appozhudhu Pelisdharin Pirapukkal: Indha Epireyar Ennaththirku Endraarkal; Aakees Avarkalaip Paarththu: Isravelin Raajaavaakiya Savulin Oozhiyakkaaranaayirundha Indhath Thaaveedhu Iththanai Naatkalum, Iththanai Varushangalum Ennotu Irukkavillaiyaa? Ivan Ennitaththil Vandhu Serndha Naal Mudhal Innaalvaraikkum Oru Kutramum Naan Ivanil Kantupitikkavillai Endraan.

4 adhanaal Pelisdharin Pirapukkal Avanmel Katungopamaaki, Avanaip Paarththu: Indha Manushan Neer Kuriththa Than Itaththirkuth Thirumpippokumpatikku, Ange Avanai Marupatiyum Anuppivitum; Yuththaththil Ivan Namakkuch Chaththuruvaayiraadhapatikku, Ivan Nammotukoota Yuththaththirku Varaventiyadhillai; Ivan Edhinaale Than Aantavanote Oppuravaavaan? Indha Manusharutaiya Thalaikalinaal Allavaa?
5 savul Kondradhu Aayiram, Thaaveedhu Kondradhu Padhinaayiram Endru Indhath Thaaveedhaikkuriththu Allavo Aatippaatich Chonnaarkal Endraarkal.

6 appozhudhu Aakees Thaaveedhai Azhaiththu: Nee Uththaman Endrum, Nee Paalayaththil Ennote Pokkum Varaththumaayirukkiradhu En Paarvaikku Nalladhu Endrum,karththarutaiya Jeevanaikkontu Sollukiren; Nee Ennitaththil Vandhu Serndha Naalmudhal Indraiyavaraikkum Naan Unnil Oru Pollaappum Kaanavillai; Aakilum Pirapukkalin Paarvaikku Nee Piriyamaanavan Alla.
7 aakaiyaal Pelisdharutaiya Pirapukkal Unmel Thaangal Ataiyaadhapatikku, Ippodhu Samaadhaanaththote Thirumpip Poivitu Endraan.

8 thaaveedhu Aakeesai Nokki: En? Naan Seydhadhu Enna? Naan Vandhu, Raajaavaakiya En Aantavanutaiya Saththurukkalote Yuththampannaadhapatikku, Naan Ummitaththil Vandha Naalmudharkontu Indraiyavaraikkum Umadhu Atiyenitaththil Kantupitiththadhu Enna Endraan.

9 aakees Thaaveedhukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Adhai Ariven; Nee Thevanutaiya Thoodhanaippola En Paarvaikkup Piriyamaanavan; Aanaalum Ivan Engalotekoota Yuththaththirku Varak Kootaadhu Endru Pelisdharin Pirapukkal Sollukiraarkal.
10 ippodhum Nee Naalai Adhikaalaiyil Unnote Vandha Un Aantavanutaiya Velaikkaararaik Koottikontu, Vitiyarkaalaththile Velichchamaakirapodhu, Purappattuppo Endraan.
11 appatiye Thaaveedhu Adhikaalaiyil Than Manusharaik Koottikkontu, Pozhudhuvitikira Neraththile, Pelisdharin Thesaththirkuth Thirumpippokap Purappattaan; Pelisdharovenil Yesrayelukkup Ponaarkal.
